belongs_to_collection.name: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark Collection

response.original_title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
response.overview: Mill Valley, Pennsylvania, Halloween night, 1968. After playing a joke on a school bully, Stella and her friends decide to sneak into a supposedly haunted house that once belonged to the powerful Bellows family, unleashing dark forces that they will be unable to control.
response.tagline: Stories taken from true urban legends
response.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
